descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][b]Discription:[/b]
>He born in Morrowind; Who is Chef, Traveling around Tamriel. He was cook a dish using traveled place's foodstuff.
He love Skyrim, and who wanted living there.

Q.Where can I meet him?
A.He Stay in whiterun, near by warmaiden (House of blacksmith').

Q.What he good at?
A.He good at Two Handed, Heavy Armor, Sheld, and Sneak. He don't good at magic.

[b]Recommend Mods:[/b]
'[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO ( Ultimate Follower Overhaul )[/url]'.
'[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6239/?]A Better body scale for Kajit and Argonian Male[/url]'.


[b]To Installation:[/b]
Copy esp file in the 'skyrim/data'.
Sorry for my bad English.Â  v(^^v)
[/font]
author: Lapset
